thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Paris - Notre Dame - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good Holiday Inn, helpful staff
thread.title_full: Good Holiday Inn, helpful staff - Review of Holiday Inn Paris - Notre Dame, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ArgentineTango
title: Good Holiday Inn, helpful staff
text:
I stayed here while on business in Paris. The hotel is very well appointed. Rooms are not enormous but well laid out and clean. There was a shower with lots of hot water and a very comfortable bed. There is also good wifi.
The staff were very helpful, providing a map and advice on the underground routes.
The hotel is very well situated for St Michel metro station allowing for access to most of the major sites. It's also easy accessible from Gare du Nord by RER.
I would definitely stay here again.
